prompt:
['A deviation from the protocol is an unintended or unanticipated departure from the', 'procedures or processes approved by the sponsor and the IRB/IEC and agreed to by', 'the investigator. A significant deviation occurs when there is nonadherence to the', 'protocol by the patient or investigator that results in a significant, additional risk to the', 'patient. Significant deviations can include nonadherence to inclusion or exclusion', 'criteria, enrollment of the patient without prior sponsor approval, or nonadherence to', 'FDA or local regulatory authority regulations or ICH GCP guidelines, and will lead to the', 'patient being withdrawn from the study (Section 5.5).', 'Protocol deviations will be documented by the clinical monitor throughout the course of', 'monitoring visits. Principal investigators will be notified in writing by the monitor of', 'deviations. The IRB/IEC should be notified of all protocol deviations in a timely manner.', 'Intra-Cellular Therapies, Inc. Confidential', '71 ITI-007-404 Protocol Amendment V 1.3 November 5, 2018']['Intra-Cellular Therapies, Inc.
